N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 319.2 - Purpose

State Regulations

To help ensure that incarcerated individuals with serious
mental illness who are placed in segregated confinement for disciplinary
purposes receive timely assessments and a heightened level of mental health
care and, absent exceptional circumstances, are placed in a residential mental
health treatment unit. Notes
